caption.p: Population density-weighted average differences among the INDC-pledge scenario and the present level of the ( a) TMX3day, ( b) TNx3day, ( c) annual mean temperature, ( d) HW, ( e) WSDI, ( f) TX90p, and ( g) TN90p in Central Asia and its subregions. The box-whisker plots show the multi-model ensemble 10th, 25th, 50th, 75th, and 90th intervals. The population density-weighted average was estimated based on the population prediction for 2100 under the socioeconomic pathway 2 (SSP2) scenario. The results of regional average refer to Figure S3. KAZ = Kazakhstan; UZB = Uzbekistan, TKM = Turkmenistan, KGZ = Kyrgyzstan, and TJK = Tajikistan.
